p.k: Soloist Christian Zacharias performs Mozart's Piano Concerto No. 6, K 238 and is accompanied by the Radio-Sinfonieorchester Stuttgart, conducted by Gianluigi Gelmetti.
p.d: Christian Zacharias performs Mozart's Piano Concerto No. 6, K 238, accompanied by the Radio-Sinfonieorchester Stuttgart under the direction of Gianluigi Gelmetti. This concert was recorded at Schwetzingen palace, where the Mannheim elector's court would spend their summers.
